pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarissā itthiyā kulūpikā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.3: Atha kho sā itthī taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.4: “handāyye, imaṁ saṅghāṇiṁ amukāya nāma itthiyā dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.6: “sacāhaṁ pattena ādāya gacchāmi vissaro me bhavissatī”ti paṭimuñcitvā agamāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.9: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo saṅghāṇiṁ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.10: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.11: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.16: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṁ dhāressati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
